amendment.description: Amendment reduces the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $15 million and increases the funding for Defense Health Program by a similar amount for the purpose of augmenting the Spinal Cord Injury Research Program within the Congressionally Directed Medical Research Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $15 million and increase the Other Department of Defense Programs Defense Health Program by $15 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Langevin.
